channel.title: XBox 360 help
channel.description:
I got the rrod, so my parents are buying me a new xbox and sending our current one in to be fixed, and when it comes back it will be sold on ebay.
I have a harddrive, does this mean i can buy a cheap arcade and put in my harddrive and use it as a normal xbox? Or is there some major difference?

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:281701”]Went to GS and gave them my old one and got a used one for 150$, works fine now. My mom said she didn’t care and it wasn’t alot of money. Plus she didn’t want to deal with microsoft. And i got oblivion like 10 minutes before i got the rrod

it was 74, and the bottom right was the only thing lit up.[/quote]
In NZ they cost less brand new… :S

Read full topic

item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:281701”]Went to GS and gave them my old one and got a used one for 150$, works fine now. My mom said she didn’t care and it wasn’t alot of money. Plus she didn’t want to deal with microsoft. And i got oblivion like 10 minutes before i got the rrod

it was 74, and the bottom right was the only thing lit up.[/quote]

I got RROD like 2 months ago, sent it in and got it back after only 1 and a half weeks.
Oi Frell what games you play? send me pm as reply.

the fu superior:

God, you could have bought like 30g of shitty weed with the 300 you spent on the Xbox arcade.

or 10g of good shit

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Like skiller noob said, you probably got Error 74.

Nonetheless, just send it in. Why do you need to buy a new xbox? Why not save yourself some money and just wait 2-3 weeks. You can’t tell me honestly that you can’t go 2-3 weeks without your xbox. Additionally, if you did buy one from GameStop, then you will lose money by selling it on eBay. It’s a complete waste.

If you really need to go buy a used one, you can go out and buy a shitty arcade console, nothing more, and pop in your hard drive and pick up right where you left off.

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

You didn’t get the real RROD, you got Error 74.

How many rings lit up?

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

sorry i thought you meant using a non standard hd like from a pc or w/e

of course you can move them from one xbox to another, they even sell extras

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

no mopman is wrong

you can put the xbox HDD from your broken console into an arcade.

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Alright well, i called gamestop and their going to sell me a used one thats just the console, corded controller, and AV/Power cord.

Now, will my other harddrive work on this? It should, and will i have to recover my xbox live account or will it be on the harddrive?

If anyone wants to know the error was E 74

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 help
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Not if you want to use Live.

Read full topic
